p.wo_num like CONCAT('%',#{wo_num},'%') and p.manu_name like CONCAT('%',#{manu_name},'%') and p.item_name like CONCAT('%',#{item_name},'%') and p.emp_Kname like CONCAT('%',#{emp_Kname},'%') and manu_date between date_format(#{manu_sdate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and now() and manu_date between date_format(#{manu_sdate}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and DATE_ADD(date_format(#{manu_date}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'), INTERVAL 1 DAY)
order by manu_date desc
select distinct e.emp_num, e.emp_Kname from employee e where emp_num = #{emp_num}

select u.wo_num, l.manu_code, l.manu_name, u.item_name,u.item_num, u.unsto_qty, sum(p.manu_tocount)-q.manu_fail manu_tocount, sum(p.manu_tocount) manu_tocount1, q.manu_fail from productstatus p right join unstore u on p.wo_num = u.wo_num right join workorder w on u.wo_num = w.wo_num left join linecode l on l.manu_name = w.manu_name left join qc_status q on w.wo_num = q. wo_num where u.unsto_progress='출고완료' and w.wo_available = '1' group by u.wo_num;
mapper.update: update productstatus set manu_tocount=#{manu_tocount}, manu_fail=#{manu_fail}, manu_date=DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') where wo_num=#{wo_num} and manu_name=#{manu_name} and item_name=#{item_name} and emp_Kname=#{emp_Kname} and manu_date=#{manu_date}
mapper.insert: insert into productstatus(manu_name, wo_num, item_name, manu_code, item_num, emp_Kname, manu_tocount, manu_fail, manu_date) values(#{manu_name},#{wo_num},#{item_name},#{manu_code},#{item_num}, #{emp_Kname}, #{manu_tocount}, #{manu_fail}, DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s'))
